page.title: 14INDUSTRY BRITISH AEROSPACE
page.content: The BAe factory at Warton is a Military Aircraft Division which makes aircraft for the R.A.F. The Managing Director is Mr. Frank Roe and the Deputy Managing Director is Mr. Dick Evans. The previous aircraft projects at Warton have been:- Canberra, Lightning, Jet Provost, Strikemaster, Jaguar, Jaguar Fly-By-Wire. The current projects are Tornado IDS and Tornado ADV and the future projects are EAP, EFA and other secret research projects. The Warton Division is the main design and development area, they also do the final assembly of aircraft and flight testing. The other BAe Divisions nearby are Preston which deals with Production work and Samlesbury which deals with aircraft spares and re-furbishing Canberras.
